How to start

How to start:

  • Java 1.6 is required
  • apache maven 2
  • Disk space about 100Mb
  • Go to https://sourceforge.net/projects/coidi/ and get access to source codes (currently SVN repo)
  • Check out project
  • You can start play with project

Where to continue

  • More information could be get form this documentation and form project mail list coidi-general@lists.sourceforge.net.
  • I you have problem please create trouble ticket at https://sourceforge.net/p/coidi/tickets/.
